name: Imprisoned Space
description:
A distress signal reaches your ship.

In the void of space, you are the only hope for a group of captives. You and your crew must survive galactic phenomena to rescue them. Work to the strengths of those beside you and get to know your alien enemy. 

With multiple endings, how will you save the prisoners?

Content Warnings: 

Violence, Blood, Death or Dying

Dedications:

One of my first Twine games made, remade, and refined over the course of a month. Huge thanks to the cool people who play tested along the way. 

For the love of Sci-Fi 💙
